snippet.title: Ridge Racer 3D - 3DS - Get into the game
snippet.description:
After the trailer revealed on the Nintendo 3DS Preview Event, dive deeper into Ridge Racer 3D thanks to this mix of replays and in-game sequences.  

Ridge Racer 3DS will be release during the months following the launch period of the Nintendo 3DS console.
Join the ridge Racer community on http://www.facebook.com/ridgefan or visit http://www.namcobandaigames.eu for more information.
